definition: good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect

sentences.english: All its preachings about democratic principles ring hollow.
sentences.chinese: 美国的所谓民主原则都是伪善的。

sentences.english: The most interesting of all the KH is hypocrite guy.
sentences.chinese: 最有趣的一类KH是那些伪善的人。

sentences.english: Pretending, in other words, to be better than we are.
sentences.chinese: 换而言之，伪善就是装成比我们自身更好的样子。

sentences.english: The shameless loafer has no facial of hypocritical male.
sentences.chinese: 无耻无赖无脸的伪善男。
不要相信他那伪善的言词。

sentences.english: The road to power is paved with hypocrisy and casualties.
sentences.chinese: 通往权力之路，由伪善和亡兵铺就。

sentences.english: “Hypocrisy is driven by mental processes over which we have volitional control, ” said Dr. Valdesolo, a psychologist at Amherst College.
sentences.chinese: 我们用意志控制了心理过程，从而滋生了伪善。

sentences.english: This is yet another example of Western hypocrisy.
sentences.chinese: 而这又是西方国家伪善的另一例子。

sentences.english: It is where hypocrisy first gained a bad name.
sentences.chinese: 它是一个“伪善”会被第一时间冠以坏名声的地方。

sentences.english: Like enriched uranium, hypocrisy can be costlier than it seems.
sentences.chinese: 就如浓缩铀，伪善的代价比看起来的更高。

sentences.english: That’s because power quickly turns us into hypocrites.
sentences.chinese: 那是因为权力会很快把我们变成伪善者。

sentences.english: Dr Lammers and Dr Galinsky call this reversal “hypercrisy”.
sentences.chinese: 拉默斯和林斯基博士称之为反向“伪善”。

sentences.english: "This war shows the hypocrisy of the world, " Mufti Selim said.
sentences.chinese: 这场战争揭示了世界的伪善。

sentences.english: I've had many foot-washers, but many men have come in with sheep's clothing.
sentences.chinese: 我有过很多提鞋的，但很多都披着伪善的外衣。

sentences.english: But hypocrisy does not strike me as the issue here.
sentences.chinese: 但在这个话题上我并不觉得你伪善。

sentences.english: You say you care about the poor, but you don't help them, you hypocrite!
sentences.chinese: 你说你关心穷人，可你并不帮助他们，你这伪善者。

definition: outside appearance and inner reality differ (idiom); not what it seems/saying one thing but meaning sth different
everything for self and selfish profit (idiom); with no regard for others/selfish/mercenary
two-faced, three knives (idiom); double-cross/double dealing and back stabbing
